name: Cubis Creatures: Free Match 3 Games
description:
Slide, Stack and Crack your way to victory in this clever and addictive match 3.

CUBIS®, the #1 Cube puzzler is back, blending old school Cubis + a completely refreshed Cubis to bring you an amazing new puzzle-game experience! Match 3 has never looked like this before! Slide and stack 3 of the same color cubes together, color by color and try to clear the board as quickly as possible. Bomb-away for bonuses, fire lasers to rack up score multipliers and trigger epic chain reactions.

Cubis is a match-3 game unlike any other! Frenetic puzzle action rushes from all sides as you slide, stack, and crack you way to victory. Easy to learn yet difficult to master - only the best and most dedicated players will earn the coveted ‘PERFECT’ rating on every level. Are you up to the challenge?

CUBIS Daily Tournaments
Think you’re the top scoring Cubis player? Get ready for Cubis Daily Tournaments; it’s your chance to show your mad scoring skills. Each day a new Cubis level will be queued for play, igniting a challenge to players around the world to achieve high score domination.

FEATURES:
- ENDLESS PLAY: Over 500 amazing handcrafted levels to be played in single mode or tournament mode.
- GLOBAL PLAY: Challenge people worldwide in daily ”Cubis Tournament”
- ACHIEVE GREATNESS: Unlock achievements one by one and see how high you can get your score!
- CLIMB TO THE TOP: Customized Game Center leaderboards - can you get to #1?
